title: Chandrika Pearl Choker with Ruby Accents - A Timeless Bandi Haaram
materials: Faceted Rubies. Features the signature Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: A multi-strand pearl choker featuring a central floral motif intricately studded with Polki diamonds, framed by delicate rubies. Side accents showcase stylized ruby flower designs. Ruby droplets suspended below the pendant add a touch of elegance. The choker is designed for a comfortable and secure fit, highlighting the neckline beautifully.
colors: Predominantly white (pearls) with vibrant ruby red accents and a warm gold tone. The interplay of colors creates a rich and regal look.
occasions: Ideal for weddings (especially Muhurtham and Sangeet)
festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranthi
or formal gatherings. Equally suited for a modern cocktail party
adding a touch of South Indian heritage to your ensemble.
description: This exquisite choker blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with a contemporary design, making it a versatile piece for any jewelry collection. The use of high-quality pearls, vibrant rubies, and Polki diamonds ensures enduring value and brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish provides a lustrous finish that will last for generations. Symbolizes purity, love, and prosperity.
